sqlMap.select:
SELECT mi.toolholderid AS toolholderid, mi.sapcode AS sapcode, mi.toolholdertype AS toolholdertype, mi.name AS name, (select name from brand where brandid = mi.brandid ) AS brandid, mi.figure AS figure, mi.figure2 AS figure2, mi.cuttype AS cuttype, mi.aemax AS aemax, mi.celength AS celength, mi.nominaldiameter AS nominaldiameter, mi.helicalangle AS helicalangle, mi.noseradius AS noseradius, mi.coneangle AS coneangle, mi.teethnumber AS teethnumber, mi.portsize AS portsize, mi.length AS length, mi.material AS material, mim.name As mimmaterialname, mi.remark AS remark, mi.k1 FROM milling_integral as mi left join milling_integral_material as mim on (mi.material = mim.bladematerialid) WHERE mi.cuttype like '%槽%' and mi.k1 !=""
mi.material = #material#
mi.material in (select bladematerialid from milling_integral_material where isotype like CONCAT("%", (select isotype from workpiecematerial where workpiecematerial.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#), "%"))
mi.cuttype = #cuttype#
mi.nominaldiameter = #nominaldiameter#
mi.celength >= #interferencedepth_or_celength#
mi.celength >= #cutedge_or_celength#
mi.celength >= #interferencedepth_or_aemax#
mi.noseradius = #noseradius#
mi.name = #name#
mi.sapcode = #sapcode#

SELECT count(1) as count FROM milling_integral as mi left join milling_integral_material as mim on (mi.material = mim.bladematerialid) WHERE mi.cuttype like '%槽%' and mi.k1 !=""
mi.material = #material#
mi.material in (select bladematerialid from milling_integral_material where isotype like CONCAT("%", (select isotype from workpiecematerial where workpiecematerial.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#), "%"))
mi.cuttype = #cuttype#
mi.nominaldiameter = #nominaldiameter#
mi.celength >= #interferencedepth_or_celength#
mi.celength >= #cutedge_or_celength#
mi.celength >= #interferencedepth_or_aemax#
mi.noseradius = #noseradius#
mi.name = #name#
mi.sapcode = #sapcode#

SELECT workpiecematerialid, name, mark, wmtype, heattreat, hardness, concat(name, '-', mark) as name2 FROM workpiecematerial a WHERE 1 = 1
order by a.workpiecematerialid
select cuttype as value from milling_integral order by cuttype

select nominaldiameter as value from milling_integral where nominaldiameter is not NULL and cuttype like '%槽%'
name = #name#
GROUP BY nominaldiameter
select celength as value from milling_integral where celength is not NULL and cuttype like '%槽%' GROUP BY celength
select aemax as value from milling_integral where aemax is not NULL and cuttype like '%槽%' GROUP BY aemax
select noseradius as value from milling_integral where noseradius is not NULL and cuttype like '%槽%' GROUP BY noseradius

SELECT mtc.toolholderid AS toolholderid, mtc.sapcode AS sapcode, mtc.name AS name, mtc.toolholdertype AS toolholdertype, (select name from brand where brandid = mtc.brandid ) AS brandid, mtc.figure AS figure, mtc.figure2 AS figure2, mtc.cuttype AS cuttype, mtc.nominaldiameter AS nominaldiameter, mtc.mainangle AS mainangle, mtc.toothnumber AS toothnumber, mtc.effectivetoothnumber AS effectivetoothnumber, mtc.portsize AS portsize, mtc.length AS length, mtc.interferencedepth AS interferencedepth, mtc.apmax AS apmax, mtc.aemax AS aemax, mtc.featurecode AS featurecode, mtc.toolweight AS toolweight, mtc.aname1 AS aname1, mtc.atype1 AS atype1, mtc.aname2 AS aname2, mtc.atype2 AS atype2, mtc.aname3 AS aname3, mtc.atype3 AS atype3, mtc.aname4 AS aname4, mtc.atype4 AS atype4, mtc.aname5 AS aname5, mtc.atype5 AS atype5, mtc.aname6 AS aname6, mtc.atype6 AS atype6, mtc.aname7 AS aname7, mtc.atype7 AS atype7, mtc.aname8 AS aname8, mtc.atype8 AS atype8, mtc.aname9 AS aname9, mtc.atype9 AS atype9, mtc.remark AS remark, mtc.priority, mtc.k1 FROM milling_toolholder_clamp as mtc WHERE mtc.cuttype like '%槽%'
mtc.nominaldiameter = #nominaldiameter#
(INSTR(mtc.featurecode,#featurecode[]#) + 0)
mtc.aemax >= #interferencedepth_or_aemax#
mtc.apmax >= #cutedge_or_apmax#
mtc.interferencedepth >= #interferencedepth#
mtc.featurecode IN (SELECT mtc.featurecode FROM milling_toolholder_clamp mtc,milling_blade_clamp mbc WHERE instr(mtc.featurecode,mbc.featurecode) AND mtc.featurecode!="" AND mbc.noseradius =#noseradius# )
mtc.featurecode IN (SELECT mtc.featurecode FROM milling_toolholder_clamp mtc,milling_blade_clamp mbc WHERE instr(mtc.featurecode, mbc.featurecode ) and mbc.bladematerialid in (select bladematerialid from milling_blade_material where isotype like CONCAT("%", (select isotype from workpiecematerial where workpiecematerial.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#), "%")) AND mbc.featurecode !="" )
mtc.name = #name#
if((SELECT codedesc from code where codedic = #cuttype# and field = "CUTTYPE") = "三面刃铣", INSTR(NAME, "三面") ,! INSTR(NAME, "三面"))
mtc.sapcode = #sapcode#
ORDER BY IF (isnull(mtc.priority), 1, 0), mtc.priority

SELECT count(1) as count FROM milling_toolholder_clamp as mtc WHERE mtc.cuttype like '%槽%'
mtc.nominaldiameter = #nominaldiameter#
(INSTR(mtc.featurecode,#featurecode[]#) + 0)
mtc.aemax >= #interferencedepth_or_aemax#
mtc.apmax >= #cutedge_or_apmax#
mtc.interferencedepth >= #interferencedepth#
mtc.featurecode IN (SELECT mtc.featurecode FROM milling_toolholder_clamp mtc,milling_blade_clamp mbc WHERE instr(mtc.featurecode,mbc.featurecode) AND mtc.featurecode!="" AND mbc.noseradius =#noseradius# )
mtc.featurecode IN (SELECT mtc.featurecode FROM milling_toolholder_clamp mtc,milling_blade_clamp mbc WHERE instr(mtc.featurecode, mbc.featurecode ) and mbc.bladematerialid in (select bladematerialid from milling_blade_material where isotype like CONCAT("%", (select isotype from workpiecematerial where workpiecematerial.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#), "%")) AND mbc.featurecode !="" )
mtc.name = #name#
if((SELECT codedesc from code where codedic = #cuttype# and field = "CUTTYPE") = "三面刃铣", INSTR(NAME, "三面") ,! INSTR(NAME, "三面"))
mtc.sapcode = #sapcode#
ORDER BY IF (isnull(mtc.priority), 1, 0), mtc.priority
select cuttype as value from milling_toolholder_clamp order by cuttype

select nominaldiameter as value, nominaldiameter as text from milling_toolholder_clamp where nominaldiameter is not NULL and cuttype like '%槽%'
name = #name#
GROUP BY nominaldiameter
select interferencedepth as value from milling_toolholder_clamp where interferencedepth is not NULL and cuttype like '%槽%' GROUP BY interferencedepth
select aemax as value from milling_toolholder_clamp where aemax is not NULL and cuttype like '%槽%' GROUP BY aemax
select apmax as value from milling_toolholder_clamp where apmax is not NULL and cuttype like '%槽%' GROUP BY apmax

SELECT mbc.bladeid AS bladeid, mbc.sapcode AS sapcode, mbc.name AS name, mbc.bladetype AS bladetype, (select name from brand where brandid = mbc.brandid ) AS brandid, mbc.figure AS figure, mbc.figure2 AS figure2, mbc.bladematerialid AS bladematerialid, mbm.name As bladematerialname, (SELECT name FROM milling_groove WHERE grooveid = mbc.grooveid ) AS grooveid, mbc.shape AS shape, mbc.reliefangle AS reliefangle, mbc.celength AS celength, mbc.turningtime AS turningtime, mbc.thichness AS thichness, mbc.noseradius AS noseradius, mbc.wiperlength AS wiperlength, mbc.characteristic AS characteristic, mbc.featurecode AS featurecode, mbc.remark AS remark, mbc.k2 FROM milling_blade_clamp as mbc left join milling_blade_material as mbm on (mbc.bladematerialid = mbm.bladematerialid) where 1=1
mbc.noseradius = #noseradius#
mbc.celength = #celength#
mbc.bladematerialid = #bladematerialid#
(INSTR(#featurecode[]#,mbc.featurecode) + 0)
mbc.bladematerialid in (select bladematerialid from milling_blade_material where isotype like CONCAT("%", (select isotype from workpiecematerial where workpiecematerial.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#), "%"))
mbc.sapcode = #sapcode2#

SELECT count(1) as count FROM milling_blade_clamp as mbc left join milling_blade_material as mbm on (mbc.bladematerialid = mbm.bladematerialid) where 1=1
mbc.noseradius = #noseradius#
mbc.celength = #celength#
mbc.bladematerialid = #bladematerialid#
(INSTR(#featurecode[]#,mbc.featurecode) + 0)
mbc.bladematerialid in (select bladematerialid from milling_blade_material where isotype like CONCAT("%", (select isotype from workpiecematerial where workpiecematerial.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#), "%"))
mbc.sapcode = #sapcode2#
select noseradius as value from milling_blade_clamp where noseradius Is Not Null GROUP BY noseradius
select celength as value from milling_blade_clamp where celength Is Not Null GROUP BY celength

SELECT a.parametersid as parametersid, a.materialid as materialid, a.workpiecematerialid as workpiecematerialid, a.wmcode as wmcode, a.K1 as K1, a.K2 as K2, a.ae as ae, a.ap as ap, a.vc as vc, IF(a.vc LIKE "%-%",CONCAT( FORMAT(((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0) ,"-", FORMAT(((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)) ,FORMAT(((1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)) as s, a.fz as fz, CASE (CONCAT(LENGTH(REPLACE(a.fz,'-','--'))-LENGTH(a.fz),LENGTH(REPLACE(IF(a.vc LIKE "%-%",CONCAT( FORMAT(((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0) ,"-", FORMAT(((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)) ,FORMAT(((1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)),'-','--'))-LENGTH(IF(a.vc LIKE "%-%",CONCAT( FORMAT(((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0) ,"-", FORMAT(((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)) ,FORMAT(((1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0))))) WHEN("00") THEN ((FORMAT(a.fz*b.toothnumber*(1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter),0))) WHEN("01") THEN CONCAT(FORMAT(b.toothnumber*a.fz*((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0),"-",FORMAT(b.toothnumber*a.fz*((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0))
WHEN("11") THEN CONCAT(FORMAT(b.toothnumber*LEFT(a.fz,LOCATE("-",a.fz))*((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0),"-",FORMAT((b.toothnumber*(RIGHT(a.fz,LENGTH(a.fz)-LOCATE("-",a.fz)))*((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter))),0) ) WHEN("10") THEN ( CONCAT(FORMAT(b.toothnumber*LEFT(a.fz,LOCATE("-",a.fz))*(1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter),0) ,"-",FORMAT(b.toothnumber*RIGHT(a.fz,LENGTH(a.fz)-LOCATE("-",a.fz))*((1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)))
END as f, a.chip as chip, a.removalrates as removalrates, a.power as power, a.remark as remark, b.apmax as apmax, b.aemax as aemax FROM milling_clamp_parameter AS a left join milling_toolholder_clamp AS b on a.k1=b.k1 WHERE 1 = 1 and a.k1 != ""
a.k1 = #k1#
b.sapcode = #sapcode#
a.k2 = #k2#
a.wmcode = (SELECT wmcode FROM workpiecematerial AS d WHERE d.workpiecematerialid=#workpiecematerialid#)
GROUP BY a.ae, a.ap, a.fz

SELECT a.parametersid as parametersid, a.materialid as materialid, a.workpiecematerialid as workpiecematerialid, a.wmcode as wmcode, a.K1 as K1, a.ae as ae, a.ap as ap, a.vc as vc, IF(a.vc LIKE "%-%",CONCAT( FORMAT(((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0) ,"-", FORMAT(((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)) ,FORMAT(((1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)) as s, a.fz as fz, CASE (CONCAT(LENGTH(REPLACE(a.fz,'-','--'))-LENGTH(a.fz),LENGTH(REPLACE(IF(a.vc LIKE "%-%",CONCAT( FORMAT(((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0) ,"-", FORMAT(((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)) ,FORMAT(((1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)),'-','--'))-LENGTH(IF(a.vc LIKE "%-%",CONCAT( FORMAT(((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0) ,"-", FORMAT(((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)) ,FORMAT(((1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0))))) WHEN("00") THEN ((FORMAT(a.fz*b.teethnumber*(1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter),0))) WHEN("01") THEN CONCAT(FORMAT(b.teethnumber*a.fz*((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0),"-",FORMAT(b.teethnumber*a.fz*((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0))
WHEN("11") THEN CONCAT(FORMAT(b.teethnumber*LEFT(a.fz,LOCATE("-",a.fz))*((1000*LEFT(a.vc,LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0),"-",FORMAT((b.teethnumber*(RIGHT(a.fz,LENGTH(a.fz)-LOCATE("-",a.fz)))*((1000*RIGHT(a.vc,LENGTH(a.vc)-LOCATE("-",a.vc)))/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter))),0) ) WHEN("10") THEN ( CONCAT(FORMAT(b.teethnumber*LEFT(a.fz,LOCATE("-",a.fz))*(1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter),0) ,"-",FORMAT(b.teethnumber*RIGHT(a.fz,LENGTH(a.fz)-LOCATE("-",a.fz))*((1000*a.vc)/(3.14*b.nominaldiameter)),0)))
END as f, a.chip as chip, a.removalrates as removalrates, a.power as power, a.remark as remark FROM milling_integral_parameter AS a left join milling_integral AS b on a.k1=b.k1 WHERE 1 = 1 and a.k1 != ""
a.k1 = #k1#
b.sapcode = #sapcode#
a.wmcode = (SELECT wmcode FROM workpiecematerial AS d WHERE d.workpiecematerialid=#workpiecematerialid#)
GROUP BY a.ae, a.ap, a.fz

select name as value, name as text from milling_toolholder_clamp where name !="" and cuttype like '%槽%'
if((SELECT codedesc from code where codedic = #cuttype# and field = "CUTTYPE") = "三面刃铣", INSTR(NAME, "三面") ,! INSTR(NAME, "三面"))
nominaldiameter = #nominaldiameter#
group by name

select name as value, name as text from milling_integral where name !="" and cuttype like '%槽%'
nominaldiameter = #nominaldiameter#
group by name

SELECT figure2 FROM milling_integral a WHERE 1 = 1
a.sapcode = #sapcode#

SELECT name FROM workpiecematerial a WHERE 1 = 1
a.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#

SELECT figure2 FROM milling_toolholder_clamp a WHERE 1 = 1
a.sapcode = #sapcode#

SELECT name FROM workpiecematerial a WHERE 1 = 1
a.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#

SELECT figure2 FROM milling_blade_clamp a WHERE 1 = 1
a.sapcode = #sapcode2#

SELECT name FROM workpiecematerial a WHERE 1 = 1
a.workpiecematerialid = #workpieceisotype#
